alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 11:09AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Rising Water Levels on Interior Rivers... Temperatures warming into the 70`s through next week will result in increased snowmelt runoff from higher elevations. This will bring rising water levels to Interior rivers that still have a significant snowpack in their headwaters. This includes rivers draining the Alaska Range and the Tanana-Yukon Uplands. Water levels may be near bankfull in some low-lying areas but flooding is not expected. People recreating on or near Interior rivers should be cautious of rising water levels, gravel bars covered with water, strong currents, and increased debris moving downstream while water levels remain high.

area.areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
